data.author: Aditi Bharade,Huileng Tan
data.title: Tiffany & Co. is setting its sights on the gold girlies
data.description: LVMH is pushing Tiffany toward gold and high jewelry, where it sees higher demand, and away from silver jewelry.
data.content:
Tiffany & Co. is pivoting away from silver jewelry.Nicolas Economou/NurPhoto
  • Tiffany & Co. will be moving away from the silver jewelry that brought it international fame.
